generalInsult: You fight like a Dairy Farmer!
bossInsult: I will milk every drop of blood from your body!
comeback: How appropriate! You fight like a cow!

generalInsult: This is the END for you, you gutter crawling cur!
bossInsult: I've got a long, sharp lesson for you to learn today.
comeback: And I've got a little TIP for you, get the POINT?

generalInsult: I've spoken with apes more polite than you!
bossInsult: Now I know what filth and stupidity really are.
comeback: I'm glad to hear you attended your family reunion!

generalInsult: Soon you'll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
bossInsult: My tongue is sharper than any sword
comeback: First you better stop waving it about like a feather duster.

generalInsult: People fall at my feet when they see me coming!
bossInsult: People fall at my feet when they see me coming!
comeback: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

generalInsult: I'm not going to take your insolence sitting down!
bossInsult: You are a pain in the backside, sir!
comeback: Your hemorroids are flaring up again eh?

generalInsult: I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
bossInsult: Only once have I met such a coward!
comeback: He must have taught you everything you know.

generalInsult: Nobody's ever drawn blood from me and nobody ever will.
bossInsult: No one will ever catch ME fighting as badly as you do.

generalInsult: Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
bossInsult: I hope you have a boat ready for a quick escape.
comeback: Why? Did you want to borrow one?

generalInsult: There are no words for how disgusting you are.
bossInsult: There are no clever moves that can help you now.
comeback: Yes there are. You just never learned them.

generalInsult: You make me want to puke.
bossInsult: If your brother's like you, better to marry a pig.
comeback: You make me think somebody already did.

generalInsult: My handkerchief will wipe up your blood!
bossInsult: My name is feared in every dirty corner of this island!
comeback: So you got that job as janitor, after all.

generalInsult: I got this scar on my face during a mighty struggle!
bossInsult: My last fight ended with my hands covered with blood.
comeback: I hope now you've learned to stop picking your nose.

generalInsult: I've heard you are a contemptible sneak.
bossInsult: My sword is famous all over the Caribbean!
comeback: Too bad no one's ever heard of YOU at all.

generalInsult: You're no match for my brains, you poor fool.
bossInsult: I've got the courage and skill of a master swordsman.
comeback: I'd be in real trouble if you ever used them.

generalInsult: You have the manners of a beggar.
bossInsult: Every word you say to me is stupid.
comeback: I wanted to make sure you'd feel comfortable with me.
